pg004_hero_subtitle: Hakuu Technology Co., Ltd. Business Introduction

consulting.title: Investment & M&A
cards: Strategic investment in companies and growth support consulting.
Support for M&A strategy formulation and execution, corporate valuation.
Advisory on business succession and capital alliances.

real_estate_sales.title: Real Estate Business
cards: Brokerage for sales and leasing of investment properties, asset consulting.
Property management, comprehensive management and maintenance of buildings and apartments.
Planning and proposals for effective real estate utilization.

housing.title: Accommodation & Dining
cards: Planning, operation, and consulting for hotels, inns, and private rentals.
Management and brand development for restaurants, cafes, and bars.
Facility maintenance and operational improvement support.

international_trade.title: International Trade & E-commerce
cards: Import/export, wholesale, and sales of various products and raw materials.
Support for building global supply chains.
Construction and operation of e-commerce (EC) sites using the internet.

tourism.title: Travel Business
cards: Planning and arrangement for domestic and international travel (individual & group).
Creation and operation of experiential tours for inbound tourists.
General domestic and international travel agency services.

it_consulting.title: Technology Consulting
cards: Formulation of IT strategies aligned with business strategies.
Technology selection and architecture design for new businesses.
Support for DX (Digital Transformation) of business processes.

solution.title: Creating Comprehensive Solutions
cards: Providing one-stop solutions through collaboration between businesses.
New business development by combining knowledge from different industries.
Comprehensive management support from a multifaceted perspective.
